channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-36383] NullPointerException throws during executor shutdown
item.description:
21/07/23 16:04:10 WARN Executor: Unable to stop executor metrics poller
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.spark.executor.Executor.stop(Executor.scala:318)
        at org.apache.spark.executor.Executor.$anonfun$stopHookReference$1(Executor.scala:76)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
